name: Shooter Game (itch) (staenlywangsa)
description:
simple game, a character has a goal and a mission to break the bubble with the bullet he has, according to the command on the target color of the bubble to be burst. every bubble that is successfully solved according to the target color will get 10 points. if the bullet hits a bubble with a color that does not match the target. then game over. 

Thanks, Let's Play

Key Note :

↑ / w : Move Up

↓ / s : Move Down

Space / left click on mouse : Shoot
